sub_015_system_kui_01:
There’s an ominous black stake driven into
the ground...
sub_015_system_kui_02: Will you pull out the stake?
sub_015_system_kui_03:
When you pulled out the stake, it crumbled
and vanished!
sub_015_system_kui_05:
You heard a mysterious cry coming from the
shrine!
sub_015_system_release_01: A faint sound is coming from within the shrine...
sub_015_system_release_05: Chien-Pao became sealed in the shrine again!
sub_015_system_release_06:
It seems like the shrine won’t open again for a
little while.
sub_015_system_hokora_01: Faint writing is carved into the shrine...
sub_015_system_hokora_03:
“THE RUINOUS SWORD’S SEAL HAS
BEEN BROKEN”
